title: Mens Short Sleeve Henley Shirts Casual Button Tee Shirts Basic Cotton T-Shirts Summer Lightweight Tee Tops
description: 【Material】:This mens henley shirts short sleeve are made from 60% Polyester,35%Cotton, 5%Spandex.Their lightweight, breathable and soft touch, and the t shirts for man are fitting cut making free movement, comfortable to wear for the whole day

【Design】:The men's henley short sleeve,round neckline basic casual t-shirts with strong well stitching, a classic fashion basic tee shirts mens,the traditional three-button design that add an element of detail while offering comfortable, effortless style.The simple and classic design makes it never be out of fashion

【Match】:These fashion mens t-shirts could be matched with stylish jeans, chinos, formal pants, shorts for a casual daily look, or paired with hats and sunglasses for a relaxed, carefree attitude, which is especially appropriate for summer

【Occasion】:Mens short sleeve shirts suitable for casual, office, work, date, party, travel, street, workout, yoga,camp,beach,birthday party,summer vacation,fishing,hiking,running,fashion street wear and daily wear.These henley shirts for men short sleeve will also be a good gift for your father, brother, boyfriend, husband, son or other male friends
【Note】:The men's henley shirts machine washable and easy to maintain. Please check size chart before ordering these mens summer shirts to ensure accurate fitting
